data.text:
BMRCL Bengaluru Metro app is beautifully designed mobile app to make the transportation easy. Enter Source and Destination Station and find basic detail of the route like distance, fare, journey duration, number of stations, and interchange if any. Finding Bangalore metro route and timing is now so easy to find.

Eg.,- Yelachenahalli to Majestic Metro Timings

Key features includes:

Â» Shows route and timing between two stations with information like total journey kilometers, fare, journey durations, total stations and changes if any between purple and green line.

Â» Stations: Scroll through Bangalore Metro Station List and know on which line (purple or green) it is located

Â» Find nearest station: Know detailed information about station (address, line, where parking available or not and the nearest station distance from your location). You can even view station and distance on Map.

Â» BMRCL Metro Map: Metro Purple line map and metro Green Line map with interchange, station marker and terminal station marker is beautifully shown here in the app.

Â» Fare Chart: Refer to know Bangalore Metro fare chart between two stations.

This is not an official mobile app of Bangalore Metro Rail Corporation Limited (BMRCL). For more details on BMRCL, visit - http://english.bmrc.co.in
